EmailTemplate.name: Launch - Existing Client
EmailTemplate.subject: Congrats! Your Property Website is Live
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Congratulations, [site url] is now live
Now that your website is live, you have access to the website on the Luxury Presence platform. Use the platform to make edits to your website.
• To login in go to app.luxurypresence.com (username is your email: [please indicate listing agent's email and register them to the Presence Account])
• To reset your password go here • Learn how to use the dashboard in this short video tutorial, watch here
Have a question or concern?
Our Client Success Team can help! Please email support@luxurypresence.com
P.S if when you no longer wish to have the property website please email support requesting cancellation.
Best,
Self Serve Property Websites Luxury Presence Phone: (310) 955-1077 Email: support@luxurypresence.com
